title: 5 Cool Ways In Which Fatherhood Has Has Changed In the Millennial Age
text:
5 Cool Ways In Which Fatherhood Has Has Changed In the Millennial Age

5 Cool Ways In Which Fatherhood Has Has Changed In the Millennial Age

PARTNER

Remember the time when seeking your father’s permission for that group outing was the biggest challenge ever? An angry stare from the head of the family was enough punishment for most of us. However, our disciplinarian dads seem to have gotten a hang of the millennial times, and are evolving with every passing day.

Be it discussing relationships with their kids to experimenting with snapchat filters, fatherhood really has changed in the millennial age. Don’t believe me? Take a look at these points!

Is That Your Dad’s Instagram?

MX Player

Just a couple of days back, my father and I connected on Instagram. Yesterday evening, I opened the app and found an adorable video of my dog playing fetch, with a trail of “OMG” comments. Guess who uploaded the video? DAD!

Fathers are taking over the social media space, and how!

Acing The Selfie Game!

MX Player

If you think only millennials know how to master the pout and grin in selfies, you might want to re-check your facts. The new-age cool dads sure know how to flex into a flattering pose for a quick selfie, sometimes even better than us.

Let’s Discuss Relationships

MX Player

Remember when relationships were a hush-hush affair at home? We’d go to any lengths to convince our parents that we’re absolutely single and innocent. Luckily for us, a wind of change has swept across and made millennial dads as cool as it gets. Fathers are warming up to the idea that their kids might go out on dates and get into relationships. What’s better? Modern day dads are making the much-needed old school advice readily available!

Binge-Watching? Dad’s Are On Board

MX Player

This is another category where our fathers might just out-cool us! Unlike us millennials who spend hours deciding what we want to watch, new-age dads are dedicated viewers who consume quality web series and documentaries oh-so-quickly.

Need For Speed Or PUBG?

MX Player

Believe me or not, fathers have joined the video game fad too. So the next time you’re looking for a strong player to team up with while playing pubG, head straight to dad!
